body_html:
@SsnL Interesting, didn't know that, perhaps it should be included in the documentation.

I'm trying to change the WeightedRandomSampler definition so that it can be looped over len(weights) times too. I'm not able to figure out how the for command breaks after num_samples iterations though. Can you point me in the right direction?

body:
@SsnL Interesting, didn't know that, perhaps it should be included in the documentation.

I'm trying to change the `WeightedRandomSampler` definition so that it can be looped over `len(weights)` times too. I'm not able to figure out how the `for` command breaks after `num_samples` iterations though. Can you point me in the right direction?
